website_summaries.verdict: The Epson PowerLite 1980WU WUXGA 3LCD Projector offers excellent image quality, high resolution, and a bright enough image for a midsize to large room.
pros: High-quality images for both data and video

customer_reviews.title: Excellent movie & video quality.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality of image, particularly for videos/movies. Does a great job in a well-lit social hall on a large screen. If I could wish for one thing, it would either be for a handle on the projector itself, or for a soft carry case with a handle and D-rings for a strap. Normal usage is ceiling mounted, but we also occasionally use it as a 'portable' for workshops/presentations in other spaces.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cornett

customer_reviews.title: I love this projector
customer_reviews.text: I love this projector, would recommend it to anyone that would like to have a small movie theater. It works as well as projector is costing thousands of dollars. I had a projector that cost $14,000 before. Fact it was not as good as this power like 1980 W.
customer_reviews.author: HERBERT ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Bright enough!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice projector. Nice remote control with sensible menus, quiet, good resolution and bright enough for a conference room with a whole wall of windows. I have it ceiling mounted, being driven via HDMI from a Mac Mini, and am pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: T.W. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Best projector I've seen.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing, beautiful picture even in a lit room. Quick power up, easy auto calibration and great HD picture make this a great choice for any home theater or just a giant daily use TV
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Best projector ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best projector in it's class on the market. I have two now and they work great in my restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: captron

customer_reviews.title: Everybody in the club is happy with this projector
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a photography club as our old DLP projector just didn't do member photos justice on the screen. Everybody in the club is happy with this projector. The 16:10 format, high resolution, and great color display is perfect for our use.
customer_reviews.author: zemlin

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures in a church environment
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, even at 52 feet! Crisp and colorful. It is used in the presenter mode with PowerPoint 2016.
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: If you buy more than one be aware that the remotes cannot be isolated. For my specific setup the units work great.
customer_reviews.author: Otter Diver

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture even in a well lit to moderately lit ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice picture even in a well lit to moderately lit room. Lots of interfacing connectors. I can use HDMI from my newer laptop, or older connections as with my oldest laptop. Sound out was fine for presentations. I like the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great projector
customer_reviews.text: So far it has meet all my expectations, great colour and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent projector for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent projector for the price. We use in in a large bar with full lighting turned on with a 116" screen. Bright and clear picture.
customer_reviews.author: Mightywiz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: High lumen projector at a great cost. I'm a big fan
customer_reviews.author: Nate Cake

customer_reviews.title: has a brilliant picture and is very easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: This one is really worth its price. has a brilliant picture and is very easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Riedel Communications

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is the next best thing to a laser projector. Great Great pictures and very easy to work with! This is a powerful projector! We use it for our church services. We can cast an EXCELLENT picture from about 90 feet away from the screen with plenty of ambient light in the room! You just have to let the bulb warm up first!
customer_reviews.author: Crazy!

customer_reviews.title: Larger and heavier than expected
customer_reviews.text: Everything works fine. Good input choices. Only problem is the size. Reminds me of my projectors 20 years ago. It is about twice the size in all directions as my old Epson. Of course, it is much brighter and higher resolution, so I should expect a larger foot print. But it was bigger than I expected (and heavier). Not convenient to carry to meetings or classrooms. Does not come with case (purchased separately for $40).
customer_reviews.author: K. Gramoll
